scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to extract personally identifiable information (PII) by feeding crafted inputs to the model and analyzing its outputs.
initial_goal: Develop a system to improve customer retention strategies based on the churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: Customer relationship management (CRM) system utilizing a machine learning model to predict customer churn based on sensitive data including financial history, demographics, and transaction details.
